sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia plans to store tactical nuclear weapons in Belarus, sending a warning to NATO over its military support for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The search for missing continues after a deadly tornado kills at least 26 people in the US.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Russia will station tactical nuclear weapons in Belarus, President Vladimir Putin has confirmed,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: sending a warning to NATO over its military support for Ukraine and escalating a standoff with the West.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moscow will complete the construction of a special storage facility for the weapons in the allied country by July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Putin has likened his plans to the US storing weapons in Europe. On the Belarusian border, Ukrainian authorities say there are now about 11,000 Russian troops. The situation in the Donetsk Oblast remains the worst in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian military is holding back an offensive by invading Russian forces near Bakhmut, preventing them from advancing. This as three Soviet-era helicopters bank and swoop down onto a field, returning from an early morning in the fight against Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thousands of environmental activists in western France clashed with police on Saturday

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: during a demonstration against irrigation reservoirs in the rural community of Saint-Solene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: According to French authorities, 28 police officers were injured, two of them seriously, and seven protesters, three of whom are in critical condition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Proponents of the reservoir say it's necessary to allow farmers to continue to grow crops, but critics call it a move by agribusiness to monopolize water supply.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Berliners are going to the polls on Sunday to vote on a proposal

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: that could drastically ramp up the German capital's climate goals. The referendum calls for Berlin to become climate neutral by 2030, a deadline that's 15 years ahead of the country's current goal. Polls show a majority of the city's inhabitants favor the earlier date, but the biggest hurdle will be getting the required 25 percent of the city's eligible voters to back it on a day when no other elections are taking place.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Search efforts continue after a deadly tornado killed at least 26 people in the southern U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The powerful storm ripped across Mississippi and Alabama, tearing off roofs, smashing cars and leveling entire neighborhoods.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: President Joe Biden tweeted that he and the first lady were praying for those who have lost loved ones and those whose loved ones are missing, promising full federal support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: people need help and it was just devastating last night. Fixed black car, trying to get everybody out when we could get out, but it was a safe location.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We lost everything, but we got our life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Told the house out, told the truck out, the car and the other cars, but we good.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As residents come to grips with this devastation, emergency services are now preparing for another round of possible tornadoes Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump held the first rally of his 2024 White House campaign on Saturday at an airfield

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: in Waco, Texas. Facing potential indictment over alleged hush money payments, Trump attacked the prosecutors investigating him you will be vindicated and proud and the thugs and criminals who are corrupting our justice system will be defeated discredited and totally disgraced Waco is known for the 1993 deadly standoff between the FBI and the branch Davidian cult.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israel's defense minister is calling on the government to halt legislation on controversial changes to the justice system, saying the bitter dispute over the measures poses an immediate and tangible danger to the security of the state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Yoav Galant's plea comes 12 weeks into weekly mass protests that have seen more than half a million people take to the streets to oppose reforms critics say will undermine the independence of the judiciary and could be used for political ends.
